nodes.title: Marketing Interns
nodes.subtitle: Freshers
nodes.description:
Join Quizzario to master the emerging infotainment industry!!
We are seeking dynamic and motivated Marketing Interns to join our team. As a Marketing Intern, you will play a vital role in our marketing initiatives, contributing to our growth and success.

Join our team and gain hands-on experience in the exciting world of marketing. If you're ready to take on challenges and grow your skills, we encourage you to apply and be part of our dynamic team.

To apply, please submit your resume and a brief cover letter highlighting your relevant experience and why you're interested in the position.

Send your CV or resume to hello@quizzarioglobal.com
requirements: Fluency in both English and Malayalam.
Flexibility to travel across Kerala for events and promotional activities.
Strong discipline and time management skills.
Energetic and self-motivated with a proactive approach.
Ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
Enthusiasm to learn and contribute to marketing strategies.
